last_episode_to_air.name: Fame and Misfortune
last_episode_to_air.overview: The concluding part reveals how the Bling Ring's crimes eventually caught up with them, thrusting them into the centre of a high-profile court case. But the defendants were not the only ones benefiting from the spotlight.

name: Bling Ring: Hollywood Heist
overview: As Nick and Rachel's crimes escalate to bigger and bigger stars, CCTV footage of the Hollywood Hills burglars begins to circulate the gossip blogs. Alexis and her family are on the brink of reality TV fame, but her drug issues spiral.

episodes.name: The Fame Game
episodes.overview: Los Angeles, 2008, in the land of fame, excess and reality TV, teenagers Alexis Neiers, Nick Prugo and Rachel Lee try to make a name for themselves by hatching a foolproof plan to burgle Paris Hilton.

episodes.name: Fame, Fortune and Felony
episodes.overview: Just as CCTV footage of the Hollywood Hills burglars began to circulate the gossip blogs. Meanwhile, as Alexis and her family found themselves on the brink of reality TV fame her drug addiction led Alexis to become increasingly intertwined with Nick.

episodes.name: Fame and Misfortune
episodes.overview: The concluding part reveals how the Bling Ring's crimes eventually caught up with them, thrusting them into the centre of a high-profile court case. But the defendants were not the only ones benefiting from the spotlight.
